recipesJson.name: Screwed Catalina #RemixMonth
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
#RemixMonth entry...
As the Aliens are Vapers too, here's my take on their sweet Strawberry Kiwi e-juice.
Adding 0.5% to 1% Vanillin 10% (TPA) to make it even sweeter, like them Aliens like it in their commercial juices.
Vanillin 10% (TPA) is one of the secret ingredients in commercial juices, try it and you'll know, in deserts but especially in fruit vapes as well.

Enjoy & comment please.
Screwdriver
